nodes.text: Soulsaber is the second adventure in the Child of Light saga written by Lee Pickler and released by the RPGA on behalf of Wizards of the Coast.

The race against the dark side continues. The dark adept Thaum Rystra has kidnapped the Child of Light to help him locate an ancient and terrible dark side weapon. You must find them before Thaum retrieves the weapon and unleashes it on the Galaxy. Episode Two of the Child of Light saga.

Four months have passed since a group of Rebel adventurers rescued Caeleb, the Child of Light, from Dalicron-4 and returned him to the Rebel Alliance, and now the boy has been kidnapped from his safe house. Tracking his kidnapper to Nar Shaddaa, the Rebels help out the infochant Rat, who is able to direct them to Pamorjal. On Pamorjal, they explore the Temples of Vormijj and discover a star map that directs them to a little-known world in the Outer Rim. However, before they can leave the planet, they are attacked by members of the Pamorjal Freeman's League who have been tricked into thinking they are agents of TaggeCo. Defeating the Freeman's League, the Rebels continue to the Outer Rim world, where they discover a cavern containing the Soulsaber. In the cavern is Caeleb with his kidnapper, Thaum Rystra. Rystra needs Caeleb to retrieve the Soulsaber from its protective shell created by the light side of the Force. He distracts the Rebels long enough to retrieve the Soulsaber and then flees, leaving the Rebels with Caeleb, whom they return to the Alliance.
